name: Ike's Axe - Demo
description:
Ike's Axe is a physics based 2D platformer for windows and android. This demo consists of 18 stages, including a final stage bossfight!

Controls for the game can be found under the Controls option in the main menu.

If you run out of lives and have at least 100 coins, a new life will be awarded and 100 coins will be deducted. Coins can be collected thru-out the stages. Bonus coins will also be awarded for achieving a quick time, collecting enemy souls, and for clearing out the filth. 

You have an unlimited number of axes to throw so be generous with your aggression! 
Boosting can get you out of some sticky situations, manage it well. Keep an eye on your Jump bar, double and triple jumps are possible with timing. (or just panic smash...it works for me!) Collect Diamonds for permanent buffs.

Credits:

Game design and coding by Isaac Sykes.

Music:

Stage: Flight Training   Song: Blob Monsters Return by Eric Matyas at https://soundimage.org/

Stage:City Bleak  Song: City Moon by Eric Matyas at https://soundimage.org/

Stage: Alpha Quadrant   Song: Constellation  by Trevor Lenz https://opengameart.org/users/trevor-lentz

Stage: Uptown   Song: While the City Sleeps by Eric Matyas at https://soundimage.org/

Stage: Downtown   Song: Delivering the Goods by Eric Matyas at https://soundimage.org/

Stage: City Bleak   Song: 10 Past Midnight by Eric Matyas at https://soundimage.org/

Stage: Downtown Plaza   Song: City of Dread by Eric Matyas at https://soundimage.org/

These guys...              ...drawn by Nicole Sloan https://drawingsbynicole.com/

This project is in early development and all assets are subject to change.
